title: Slow cooker veggie chilli
ingredients: ['2 (400g) tins whole plum tomatoes', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained', '2 courgettes, thinly sliced', '1 onion, chopped', '2 carrots, sliced', '2 stalks celery, sliced', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 green chilli, seeded and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon salt']
